pkgmetadata.longdescription: Welcome to dnutils==================Install dnutils with: pip install dnutilsPlease visit the project page athttps://spritinio.de/dnutils/index.htmlChanges 0.3.6=============* new functions in tools, console, debug, stats* new modules math, datesChanges 0.3.5=============* fixed signals on Windows machines.Changelog 0.2.9===============Changelog 0.2.8===============* import error "monotonic" in threadsafe on python 2* import threads.Timer in __init__.py* fixed internal representation in Gaussian
